content.title: Lymphatic Malformation Treatment

key_concepts.details: First-line for macrocystic LM; OK-432 (picibanil), doxycycline, bleomycin, ethanol
Consider for localized lesions or sclerotherapy failures; complete excision difficult
mTOR inhibitor showing efficacy for complex lymphatic anomalies
May be appropriate for asymptomatic small lesions; spontaneous regression rare

content.clinical_significance: Macrocystic LMs respond better to treatment than microcystic forms
